name: EveryBody
description:
No one plays in hell, but everybody (or every body) has music within them. 

You are in hell. 

You don't have a shotgun or a chainsaw but you do have a guitar and a master plan. 

The plan: Recruit the citizens of Hell to form the most epic band the underworld has ever seen to impress the Devil so you can go back to living. 

What could go wrong?

Controls

[ A/S/K/L ] to play music
[ Space ] to forward dialogue

Be sure to check out the high scores!
